name: Vitale #18
description: Your 1.00 carat Fancy Orangey Pink diamond is rare, with a captivating and distinctive combination of hues. The pink colour of your diamond is the product of a geological phenomenon that occurs when certain diamonds undergo more forcible pressure and heat than others. The distorted atomic structure resulting from this process bends light rays at an angle that absorbs green light, producing the pink tint. In addition, the presence of nitrogen atoms donates your diamond a unique orange nuance. Recalling a beautiful sunset, the blend of orange and pink hues in your diamond may symbolise energy, warmth, and romance.
